item.title: 比特币涨势将全球原始加密 ETF 甩在身后
item.description: 在比特币创纪录的一年里，世界上首批持有加密货币的交易所交易基金的发起者们似乎面临着被抛在后面的风险。【原文：In what’s been a record-breaking year for Bitcoin, the originators of the world’s first exchange-traded funds to hold the cryptocurrency appear to be at risk of being left behind.】

item.title: 比特币连续两日刷新纪录，攀升至 110,000 美元
item.description: 比特币连续第二日创下历史新高，交易商们对 11 万美元的价格水平虎视眈眈。【原文：Bitcoin reached an all-time high for a second consecutive day, with traders eyeing the $110,000 price level.】

item.title: 反对 DEI 雇用目标的基金以耐克、卡夫和欧特克为目标
item.description: 一家计划反对企业 DEI 雇用目标的新投资基金将矛头指向耐克公司、卡夫亨氏公司和欧特克公司。【原文：A new investment fund that plans to oppose corporate DEI hiring goals is taking aim at Nike Inc., Kraft Heinz Co. and Autodesk Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普将削减繁文缛节，美国住宅建筑商前景大好
item.description: 房屋建筑商对未来六个月的展望升至两年半多来的最高点，因为他们乐观地认为，即将上任的特朗普政府将有助于消除建筑监管障碍并促进销售。【原文：Home builders’ outlook for the next six months rose to the highest in more than 2 1/2 years on optimism that the upcoming Trump administration will help remove construction regulatory hurdles and boost sales.】

item.title: 美国工业生产因采矿业和公用事业意外下滑
item.description: 由于公用事业产出和采矿业疲软，美国 11 月份工业生产出人意料地连续第三个月下降。【原文：US industrial production unexpectedly declined for a third month in November on weaker utility output and mining.】

item.title: Databricks 大规模融资后估值将达 620 亿美元
item.description: Databricks 公司正在筹集 100 亿美元的新资金，这笔巨额现金注入将使这家软件制造商的估值达到 620 亿美元。【原文：Databricks Inc. is raising $10 billion in new funding, a massive cash injection that will bring the software maker’s valuation to $62 billion.】

item.title: 大亨阿达尼将与安布贾合并桑吉和彭纳水泥公司
item.description: 随着亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）精简对印度基础设施建设至关重要的业务，阿达尼集团将通过合并 Ambuja 水泥有限公司旗下的两个单位来整合其水泥业务。【原文：Adani Group will consolidate its cement operations by merging two units under Ambuja Cements Ltd. as billionaire Gautam Adani streamlines a business that is vital for India’s infrastructure push.】

item.title: 经济学家因关税担忧上调 2025 年美国通胀预期
item.description: 由于担心关税问题，经济学家们上调了对明年美国通胀的预测，现在他们预计美联储的降息次数将比一个月前的预期少一次。【原文：Economists raised their projections for US inflation next year on tariff concerns and now expect one less interest-rate cut from the Federal Reserve than they anticipated a month ago.】

item.title: 微策略公司登陆纳斯达克开启动量风险新时代
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc.’s entry into the Nasdaq 100 opens up the largest corporate holder of Bitcoin to a new — and untapped – investor: the index-tracking juggernauts.】

item.title: 曼联即将扭亏为盈，瑞银买入曼联
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的分析师表示，曼联球迷又在遭受一个冷淡的赛季，但这家足球俱乐部老板的前景却是光明的。【原文：Manchester United fans are suffering another indifferent season, but the outlook for the football club’s owner is rosy, according to analysts at UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 欧盟重新审视没收俄罗斯被冻结资产问题
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧盟正在评估没收俄罗斯受制裁央行资产供乌克兰使用的法律和财务影响。【原文：The European Union is assessing the legal and financial implications of confiscating Russia’s sanctioned central bank assets for use by Ukraine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国财政机构支持欧盟发行主权债务的申请
item.description: 德国财政局支持欧盟试图将该集团的债务重新归类为主权发行人的债务，以便进入重要指数。【原文：Germany’s Finance Agency supports the European Union’s attempt to reclassify the bloc’s debt as that of a sovereign issuer in order to gain access to important indexes.】

item.title: 美国零售销售因汽车购买量激增而超出预期
item.description: 美国 11 月份零售额增长强劲，这主要得益于汽车购买量的激增，而汽车购买量的激增掩盖了其他方面较为参差不齐的支出。【原文：US retail sales increased at a firm pace in November, bolstered by a surge in car purchases that masked more mixed spending elsewhere.】

item.title: 通胀率降至 1.9%，支持加拿大央行的鸽派立场
item.description: 加拿大通胀率在三个月内第二次低于央行的目标，这对今年下半年积极降息的决策者来说是个证明。【原文：Canadian inflation fell below the central bank’s target for the second time in three months, vindication for policymakers who have cut interest rates aggressively in the second half of this year.】

item.title: 移民抑制使加拿大人口增长降至两年来最低点
item.description: 加拿大第三季度新增人口 17.7 万人，比第二季度增长 0.4%，是自 2022 年初以来增长速度最慢的一个季度。【原文：Canada added 177,000 people in the third quarter, growing the population by 0.4% from the second quarter and representing the slowest growth since early 2022.】

item.title: 共同基金转换率创 ETF 行业史诗年新高
item.description: 今年，以热门投资为主题的新型交易所交易基金推动了创纪录的行业增长。然而，对于将久经考验的共同基金改造成节税产品的基金经理来说，这也将是一个旗帜鲜明的时代。【原文：New exchange-traded funds riding buzzy investment themes are helping fuel record industry growth this year. Yet, it’s also shaping up to be a banner era for money managers revamping their tried-and-tested mutual funds into the tax-efficient product.】

item.title: 西塔拉曼称印度近期增长乏力只是暂时的昙花一现
item.description: 印度财政部长尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）称，上一季度印度经济增长放缓是 "暂时的昙花一现"，并表示未来几个月经济增长有望反弹。【原文：India’s Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman called the country’s softer expansion in the last quarter a “temporary blip,” adding that growth is expected to bounce back in the coming months.】

item.title: 雄狮电动车预计将在电动车反弹中申请破产
item.description: 魁北克省投入数十亿美元在北美电动汽车供应链中占据一席之地，但这些努力却因一连串坏消息而受挫。最新消息是：电动巴士和卡车制造商 Lion Electric 公司预计将寻求债权人保护。【原文：Quebec committed billions of dollars to carve out its place in North America’s electric vehicle supply chain, but those efforts have been thwarted by a string of bad news. The latest: electric bus and truck maker Lion Electric Co. expects to seek creditor protection.】

item.title: Palantir的迈克-加拉格尔（Mike Gallagher）称科技初创企业是国防部改革的关键
item.description:
高管希望华盛顿特区利用硅谷的国防技术热潮。【原文：

Executive wants DC to tap into Silicon Valley’s defense tech boom. 

】

item.title: 匈牙利在通胀加速后维持关键利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利中央银行将其关键利率维持在欧盟最高水平之一，此前通胀加速，匈牙利货币对欧元的汇率仍接近两年来的最低点。【原文：Hungary’s central bank kept its key interest rate at one of the highest levels in the European Union after inflation accelerated and the currency remained close to a two-year low against the euro.】

item.title: TCW 坚持债券赌注，赔钱又吓唬客户
item.description: TCW 集团公司的布莱恩-惠伦（Bryan Whalen）在遭遇巨额亏损后，坚持了华尔街大多数人都放弃的看法。【原文：TCW Group Inc.’s Bryan Whalen is sticking to a call that most everyone else on Wall Street abandoned after piling up losses.】

item.title: 摩洛哥降低关键利率，促进世界杯投资热潮
item.description: 摩洛哥今年第二次降低利率，放宽借贷成本，以鼓励大规模投资，其中包括为共同举办 2030 年国际足联世界杯做准备。【原文：Morocco cut interest rates for the second time this year, easing borrowing costs to encourage a massive investment drive that includes preparations to co-host the 2030 FIFA World Cup.】

item.title: Crypto.com 首席执行官在马阿拉歌与特朗普会面，业界寻求在新政府中发挥影响力
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将重返白宫之前，数字资产行业的高管们也加入了前往马阿拉歌朝圣的科技公司首席执行官行列。【原文：Executives in the digital-asset industry are joining the ranks of tech CEOs making the pilgrimage to Mar-a-Lago to meet with President-elect Donald Trump before his impending return to the White House.】

item.title: 巴西央行在货币市场大跌中再次介入
item.description: 巴西央行周二再次介入货币市场，因为即使在决策者承诺将利率提高到八年高点之后，雷亚尔仍在继续走软。【原文：Brazil’s central bank stepped into currency markets again on Tuesday as the real continues to weaken even after policymakers pledged to lift interest rates to eight-year highs.】

item.title: 尽管有绿色目标，中国仍在推进能源安全中拥抱煤炭
item.description:
激增的产量不仅仅是为了满足需求，更是为了确保永不短缺。【原文：

Surging production isn’t merely about meeting demand, it’s making sure there’s never a shortage.

】

item.title: 华尔街智能交易综合体蓬勃发展，简单投注也能获胜
item.description: 华尔街复杂投资产品的印刷机在今年大放异彩，为银行家、对冲基金经理和 ETF 发行商赚取了大量费用。【原文：Wall Street’s printing press for complex investment products is having a blockbuster year, minting fees for bankers, hedge fund managers and ETF issuers.】

item.title: 如果乌克兰过境结束，埃纳格斯公司的天然气供应量将创历史新高
item.description: 欧洲最大的液化天然气终端运营商 Enagas SA 准备在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后，如果一项重要的天然气过境协议终止而导致需要出口液化天然气，那么该公司的出口量将超过历史最高纪录。【原文：Enagas SA, Europe’s largest LNG terminals operator, is ready to surpass its record exports in the aftermath of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine should the end of a key gas transit deal create the need for it.】

item.title: 德国经济步履蹒跚，房地产市场复苏受阻
item.description: 房地产经纪商仲量联行公司（Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.【原文：A deteriorating economic outlook thwarted the up-tick in German real estate transactions investors had hoped for at the beginning of the year, real estate broker Jones Lang LaSalle Inc. said.】

item.title: 汉斯的安宁顿在军事遗产出售后旨在重组债务
item.description: Guy Hands 的 Annington Funding Plc 计划将出售军用住宅所得的部分收益返还给英国政府，用于 "重塑 "其资产负债表，并使目前的债务结构更加合理。【原文：Guy Hands’ Annington Funding Plc plans to use part of the proceeds it receives from a sale of military homes back to the UK government to “reshape” its balance sheet and rationalize the current debt structure.】

item.title: 俄罗斯海运原油量自 10 月份以来下降 11
item.description:
该国的海运流量稳定在每天 300 万桶附近

。【原文：

Country’s seaborne flows stabilize near 3 million barrels a day

】
